title: Welcoming Remarks by Chair Powell at the 2019 Federal Reserve System Community Development Research Conference
content: For release on delivery  8:30 a.m. EDT   May 9, 2019      Welcoming Remarks         by     Jerome H. Powell     Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the      2019 Federal Reserve System Community Development Research Conference:  “Renewing the Promise of the Middle Class”     Washington, D.C.    May 9, 2019
